channel.title: E-Mack 600 by Carlos Aviles
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][pre][b]E-MACK[/b][/pre][/size][/center]
[size=18pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
[size=8pt]E-Mack will be a MMORPG and a RuneScape emulator which will aim to encourage a fundamentally-different alternative to the way in which RuneScape private server development is done. It consists of the new up to date Java SE Development Kit 7 Update 40 (jdk1.7.0_40). This project will most likely be one of my best since I will be coding it 24-7(not literally). [/size]
[size=18pt][b]Revision:[/b][/size]
[size=8pt]E-Mack will be [i]201[/i]. (2004). [/size]
[size=18pt][b]License:[/b][/size]
[size=8pt]Copyright (c) 2013 Carlos Aviles
Permission to use, copy, modify, and/or distribute this software for any purpose with or without fee is hereby granted, provided that the above copyright notice and this permission notice appear in all copies.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND THE AUTHOR DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, DIRECT, INDIRECT, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE. [/size]
[size=18pt][b]Author(s):[/b][/size]
[b][size=10pt]Carlos Aviles:[/size][/b] [size=8pt]Primary Author, came up with the idea. Is currently the only author and started the project by scratch with an IDE.[/size]
[size=18pt][b]Development Blogs(Vlogs):[/b][/size]
[code=java] public static void main(String[] args) { ControlP.println("E-Mack has been initialized."); }[/code]
I will update later, the above cdoe is all I have. I am currently trying to figure out the login protocol for a 201.

item.title: E-Mack 600 by Carlos Aviles
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

From what I can see code-wise, there is nothing RSPS-related here at all. Consider posting this when you’re further along in your development and you actually have something to show for your work. When I say that, I’m not talking about 2-3 lines of code per class file, I’m talking about pictures, features, etc.

This section is for Runescape development, and while you claim that you’re developing one (which is fair enough), please repost this when the project is further down the track.

Read full topic

item.title: E-Mack 600 by Carlos Aviles
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:

I can’t, if I stop I’d have to do chores.

You obviously wont make it in life then.

item.title: E-Mack 600 by Carlos Aviles
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

you’re putting so much effort into useless trolls that no one finds funny lol, just quit it dude

and the fact that moderators really don’t acknowledge any of it is kinda disappointing. oh well, nothing but the best at moparscape!
